rules.name: default

children.name: Performance
Compressible Objects
children.comments: Compresses content to improve performance of clients with slow connections. Applies Last Mile Acceleration to requests when the returned object supports gzip compression.

children.name: Image Manager
children.comments: Enable Scale for Mobile to serve the best available size for the requesting device. (Careful testing is highly recommended.) Enable Use Best File Type to serve the image format that works best for the requesting client. To configure breakpoint widths, derivative image quality, and artistic transformations, save and activate this configuration; then, create policies for this policy set via either Image Manager Policy Manager or the OPEN Image Manager API.

options.xml:
<match:request.type value="CLIENT_REQ">
    <match:hoit host="fonts.googleapis.com" result="false">
        <edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
            <status>on</status>
            <name>Link</name>
            <value><%(AK_SCHEME)://fonts.googleapis.com>; rel=preconnect</value>
        </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
    </match:hoit>
    <match:hoit host="fonts.gstatic.com" result="false">
        <edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
            <status>on</status>
            <name>Link</name>
            <value><%(AK_SCHEME)://fonts.gstatic.com>; rel=preconnect</value>
        </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
    </match:hoit>
    <match:hoit host="maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com" result="false">
        <edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
            <status>on</status>
            <name>Link</name>
            <value><%(AK_SCHEME)://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com>; rel=preconnect</value>
        </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
    </match:hoit>
    <match:hoit host="www.google-analytics.com" result="false">
        <edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
            <status>on</status>
            <name>Link</name>
            <value><%(AK_SCHEME)://www.google-analytics.com>; rel=preconnect</value>
        </edgeservices:modify-outgoing-response.add-header>
    </match:hoit>
</match:request.type>

children.comments: Improves the performance of delivering objects to end users. Behaviors in this rule are applied to all requests as appropriate.

children.name: Offload
CSS and JavaScript
children.comments: Overrides the default caching behavior for CSS and JavaScript objects that are cached on the edge server. Because these object types are dynamic, the TTL is brief.

children.name: Static Objects
children.comments: Overrides the default caching behavior for images, music, and similar objects that are cached on the edge server. Because these object types are static, the TTL is long.

children.name: Uncacheable Responses
children.comments: Overrides the default downstream caching behavior for uncacheable object types. Instructs the edge server to pass Cache-Control and/or Expire headers from the origin to the client.
Controls caching, which offloads traffic away from the origin. Most objects types are not cached. However, the child rules override this behavior for certain subsets of requests.

customCertificateAuthorities.subjectCN: DigiCert SHA2 High Assurance Server CA

subjectRDNs.CN: DigiCert SHA2 High Assurance Server CA

issuerRDNs.CN: DigiCert High Assurance EV Root CA
DigiCert SHA2 High Assurance Server CA

variables.name: PMUSER_MANUAL_PUSH_URLS
variables.description: URLS To be manually pushed to client

rules.comments: The behaviors in the Default Rule apply to all requests for the property hostname(s) unless another rule overrides the Default Rule settings.
